rev.comment: /* Voices on South Park */ unnecessary fair use; linked to main article
rev.diff:
Line 82: Line 82:
===Voices on ''[[South Park]]''===
===Voices on ''[[South Park]]''===
â
[[Image:KyleBroflovski.png|right|thumb|200px|[[Kyle Broflovski]], a ''[[South Park]]'' character based largely on Matt Stone.]]
 
Matt Stone voices [[Kyle Broflovski]], [[Kenny McCormick]] and [[Leopold "Butters" Stotch]], three of the main characters on the show, as well as Kyle's father [[Gerald and Sheila Broflovski|Gerald]] and Kenny's father [[Stuart and Carol McCormick|Stuart]]. He also voices recurring characters [[Jimbo Kern]], [[Jesus (South Park)|Jesus]], [[Saddam Hussein (South Park)|Saddam Hussein]], [[Big Gay Al]], [[Pip (South Park)|Pip]], [[Terrance and Phillip|Terrance]], [[Tweek Tweak#Tweek|Tweek]], [[Craig Tucker]], [[Father Maxi]], [[List_of_other_South_Park_residents#Skeeter|Skeeter]], [[Mr. Adler]], and [[Osama bin Laden]]
Matt Stone voices [[Kyle Broflovski]], [[Kenny McCormick]] and [[Leopold "Butters" Stotch]], three of the main characters on the show, as well as Kyle's father [[Gerald and Sheila Broflovski|Gerald]] and Kenny's father [[Stuart and Carol McCormick|Stuart]]. He also voices recurring characters [[Jimbo Kern]], [[Jesus (South Park)|Jesus]], [[Saddam Hussein (South Park)|Saddam Hussein]], [[Big Gay Al]], [[Pip (South Park)|Pip]], [[Terrance and Phillip|Terrance]], [[Tweek Tweak#Tweek|Tweek]], [[Craig Tucker]], [[Father Maxi]], [[List_of_other_South_Park_residents#Skeeter|Skeeter]], [[Mr. Adler]], and [[Osama bin Laden]]
